summary: A highly skilled and versatile culinary professional with a unique blend of food preparation, logistics, and operations expertise. Proven track record of delivering high-quality results in fast-paced kitchen environments. Possesses a strong foundation in food safety, sanitation, and menu design. Utilized skills in workflow optimization and P/L management to drive efficiency and profitability in previous roles. Proficient in menu design, food handling, and meal preparation, with a strong focus on customer satisfaction and team collaboration.
education: Culinary Arts Program, Placer County Adult Education

bullets: Operated heavy agricultural machinery in a 24/7 biological manufacturing environment
Managed feedstock logistics, processing raw materials into Total Mixed Ration (TMR) with precision
Directed livestock movement and herd management, ensuring efficient process flow within the facility
Executed last-mile delivery operations for consumer goods and food service
Developed foundational skills in route optimization, customer service, and inventory preparation
